x-api-store-short-desc: Notices of Compliance (NOC) issued to manufacturers following the satisfactory review of a submission for a new drug, and signifies compliance with the Food and Drug Regulations.
x-api-store-long-desc:
A Notice of Compliance (NOC) is issued to a manufacturer following the satisfactory review of a submission for a new drug, and signifies compliance with the Food and Drug Regulations.

The database is updated nightly and contains NOC information on human drugs from January 1, 1994 to date. It also contains NOC information on Veterinary drugs from September 19, 2000 to date. Through a phased in approach Health Canada will populate the remaining NOCs for Veterinary drugs from January 1, 1994 to September 18, 2000.

public.name: Public Plan
public.description: All users should subscribe to the Public Plan.

info.title: Notice of Compliance (NOC)
info.description:
A Notice of Compliance (NOC) is issued to a manufacturer following the satisfactory review of a submission for a new drug, and signifies compliance with the Food and Drug Regulations.

The database is updated nightly and contains NOC information on human drugs from January 1, 1994 to date. It also contains NOC information on Veterinary drugs from September 19, 2000 to date. Through a phased in approach Health Canada will populate the remaining NOCs for Veterinary drugs from January 1, 1994 to September 18, 2000.

200.description: Returns a list of all drug products, or if an ID is provided, the list of all drug products that correspond to the given Notice of Compliance number
Returns a list of all compliance notices, or if an ID is provided, the list of all notices of compliance that correspond to the given Notice of Compliance number
Returns a list of all dosage forms, or if an ID is provided, the list of all dosage forms that correspond to the given Notice of Compliance number
Returns a list of all medicinal ingredients, or if an ID is provided, the list of all medicinal ingredients that correspond to the given Notice of Compliance number
Returns a list of all administration routes, or if an ID is provided, the list of all routes that correspond to the given Notice of Compliance number
Returns a list of all veterinary species, or if an ID is provided, the list of all species that correspond to the given Notice of Compliance number

DosageForm.description: The dosage form is the form in which the product is supplied. It is the combination of the form in which a product is presented [for example (e.g.)] in tablet, capsule or powder form, and the physical form in which it is administered, [for example, (e.g.)] in a powder to be administered in solution.

noc_number.description: The number assigned to the Notice of Compliance.

noc_pf_din_product_id.description: The identification number assigned to the DIN product.

DrugProduct.description: Basic information about the product, such as brand name and Drug Identification Number. The brand name is the unique name under which the manufacturer of a drug product advertises and sells it

noc_number.description: The number assigned to the Notice of Compliance.

noc_br_brand_id.description: The identification number assigned to the brand.

noc_br_brandname.description: The brand name for the drug product.

noc_br_product_id.description: The identification number assigned to the DIN product.

MedicinalIngredient.description: A medicinal ingredient is any component that has medicinal properties, and supplies pharmacological activity or other direct effect in the diagnosis, cure, mitigation, treatment or prevention of disease, or to affect the structure or any function of the body of man or other animals.

noc_number.description: The number assigned to the Notice of Compliance.

noc_pi_din_product_id.description: The identification number assigned to the DIN product.

noc_pi_strength.description: The strength of the medicinal ingredient.

NoticeOfCompliance.description:
A Notice of Compliance is a notification, issued pursuant to paragraph C.08.004(1)(a), indicating that a manufacturer has complied with sections C.08.002 or C.08.003 and C.08.005.1 of the Food and Drug Regulations. Notices of Compliance are issued to a manufacturer following the satisfactory review of a submission.

An NOC/c is the authorization to market a drug ([such as (i.e.)] a Notice of Compliance (NOC)), with the condition that the manufacturer carries out more studies to verify the clinical benefit. The NOC, qualifying under the NOC/c policy (Notice of Compliance with Conditions: Revised Policy), is issued under section C.08.004 of the Food and Drug Regulations.

noc_number.description: The number assigned to the Notice of Compliance.

noc_date.description: The date the Notice of Compliance was issued.

noc_status_with_conditions.description: Whether the product was authorized under the Notice of Compliance with Conditions Policy.

noc_is_suppliment.description: Whether the submission is a supplement.

noc_is_admin.description: Whether the submission was filed administratively.

noc_crp_product_name.description: The name of the Canadian Reference Product.

noc_crp_company_name.description: The company name for the Canadian Reference Product.

noc_crp_country_name.description: The country name for the Canadian Reference Product.

noc_active_status.description: Whether or not the Notice of Compliance is active or suspended.

noc_reason_supplement.description: If the submission is a supplement, the reason for the supplement.

noc_therapeutic_class.description: The therapeutic class of a drug product.

noc_last_update_date.description: The date that the Notice of Compliance was last updated.

RouteOfAdministration.description:
This term indicates the part of the body on which, through which or into which the product is to be introduced. (e.g. oral, topical, intramuscular, rectal, etc.)

A product can have more than one route of administration (e.g. intravenous, intramuscular, intra-articular, etc.).

noc_number.description: The number assigned to the Notice of Compliance.

noc_pr_din_product_id.description: The identification number assigned to the DIN product.

VeterinarySpecies.description: The type of species for a certain veterinary products (e.g. sheep, dog, cattle, and poultry).

noc_number.description: The number assigned to the Notice of Compliance.

QueryLang.name: lang
QueryLang.description: Define which language you would like the response to be in

QueryType.name: type
QueryType.description: Define which media type you would like the content to be in

QueryNoticeOfComplianceNumber.name: id
QueryNoticeOfComplianceNumber.description: Limit results to those with a matching Notice of Compliance number

UserKeys.name: user-key
UserKeys.description: The identifier assigned to your account for accessing the API
